conbody.p: Contracting officers shall insert the clauses at 48 CFR 52.225-1, Buy American Act - Supplies, and 48 CFR 52.225-9, Buy American Act - Construction Materials, in management and operating contracts. The clause at 48 CFR 52.225-1 shall be modified in paragraph (d) of this section by substituting the word “use” for the word “deliver.”
